title: Exiled Prince Without Skills: Infinite Growth in a Mysterious Dungeon - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Ecchi   Fantasy   Harem   Shounen
tags: Charismatic Protagonist   Cheats   Demi-Humans   Dungeons   Elves   Fantasy World   Game Elements   Hard-Working Protagonist   Harsh Training   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Kingdom Building   Level System   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Protagonist   Monsters   Nobles   Royalty   Special Abilities   Sword And Magic   Sword Wielder   Underestimated Protagonist   Weak to Strong
author: Funazu   ふなず
description:
Henry, born in a royal family without skills, is given territory on the border. It’s a grassland full of monsters,, with no people, no resources, and no hope.

Disheartened, Henry wanders the grasslands and falls underground through a hole. However, the moment he touches a stone monument there, words echo in his mind.

It is a mysterious dungeon filled with ancient items, traps, and malevolence. If you die inside, you lose your status and have to start over, but that doesn’t matter to Henry’s off-the-charts skill, “Maintain Status”. No matter how many times he dies, he can always grow and start over.

Henry will die again today. All for the sake of developing his territory with dungeon clear rewards.>
